{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Jensen |model=JSB-550 |fcc_date=09/25/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless speaker system, audio streamer |fcc_id=LMZ-31324GC |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7688A;MT7688AN; |wi1_module=Linkplay A31 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7688A;MT7688AN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Bluetooth V2.1 + EDR Single Chip;MediaTek;MT6622N;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR, Audio in (3.5mm), Alexa, |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} {{TagLine|Alexa Enabled Bluetooth/WiFi Wireless Stereo Smart Speaker}}
*"Linkplay A31 V04" is silkscreened on the CPU module in the FCC photos. *"CDTECH BTA6622-03" is silkscreened on the Bluetooth module. *"C02 V02 Linkplay" is silkscreened on the Voice control module.
FCC external photos and test report documents suggest additional branding: * '''BUSH B100ALF''' - ''BUSH Speaker with Amazon Alexa'' * '''iStation23AC''' - ''Amazon Echo Multi-room Hi-Fi Speaker System''
;[https://linkplay.com/solutions/wifi-module/ Linkplay Wireless Speaker Modules] *[[Linkplay A28]] - ''Wi-Fi Speaker Module'' ([[MediaTek]] MT7628A) :802.11bgn 2T2R (300Mbps), Analog audio output *[[Linkplay A31]] - ''Wi-Fi Speaker Module'' ([[MediaTek]] MT7688A) :802.11bgn 1T1R (150Mbps), Digital audio input/output
===See also=== *[[Jensen JSB-1000]] - ''Hi-Res Wireless Speaker with Chromecast Built-In '' â€¢ [https://www.bestbuy.com/site/jensen-jsb-1000-hi-res-wireless-speaker-with-chromecast-built-in-black/5889029.p?skuId=5889029 Best Buy] *[[Toshiba TY-GC1000]] - ''Bluetooth Speaker with Chromecast Built-in''
